author: Sam Leon
comment: Constantly not working. Update your pharmacy webpage.

author: Eric Churchill
comment: Search doesn't work at all. Search for "almond" and nothing comes up. But if you scan something, it can find it and had a ton of info, including picture and aisle number.

author: Laura B
comment: *Fixed by signing out and back in.** Can't view or add coupons, broke a few updates back and hasn't been fixed even on the latest update. App is unusable.
Useless app, don't bother downloading. Full of bugs , must have been developed by a relative of a QFC exec to have even make it past their own sense of embarrassment on releasing this

author: DJ Allyn
comment: It can't find the store I am standing in front of right now.  It can't seem to add "oatmeal" to a list, and speaking of the lists, it won't save it.  Worthless.

author: Sarah Kozlen
comment: After most recent update app will no longer show coupons, some reason to even use the app

author: Washington Crazy Drivers
comment: This app is frustrating. It wouldn't let me put in the password I wanted to when I registered, so I had to go with something else that I probably won't remember. Plus, when I tried to put in my loyalty card, it wouldn't accept it no matter what I did. I am not impressed.

author: Eric Snyder
comment: We've been using this app for years in various forms (different Kroger family stores), and the most recent update has us close to deleting it.  I can no longer add "fruit" to the list, or any general item.  Now only specific items can be added to the list.  So, no putting "pills" on the list to remind me to stop by the pharmacy, no putting "trash bags" on the list, you have to pick a specific brand (if it even shows up!), and so forth.  Whoever had the idea to make that change, please change it back!

author: Kyle Nicholas
comment: Can't fill prescriptions because app says session expired. Put in my password and every time it says session expired. That's the reason I downloaded this app so I could get refills. Since I can't do that, uninstall.

author: Spencer Bereiter
comment: Love!!!!

author: Evalani Tuato'o
comment: I've gotten great deals. Sometimes the online coupons don't come off but if you let the cashier or manager know, they will usually take it off manually for you. Love this app.
title: Never had problems with the app

author: Jordan Mckenzie
comment: Horrible. Unfair promotional discounts for only certain people. Ugly design and layout. Confusing gui.

author: Kathleen Melrose
comment: Friendly, fast, curtious.
title: Safeway

author: James Bray
comment: unfair promotional products some people get the deal and others dont? instant uninstall.
title: horrible

author: Michael Convey
comment: This app was pretty good until the 12/14/16 version 12.0 update. Now, as soon as I open the app, it tells me I've been locked out of my account due to too many login attempts and that I need to wait 30 minutes. However, there's nothing I can do -- it happens as soon as I open the app. I called customer service, but they said they cannot unlock my account -- strange -- what good is customer service if they are not empowered to help. In short, this version is useless to me, so I uninstalled the app.

author: Patricia Anne Moomaw
comment: Really convenient, glad to have this app for the store where I shop most often!
title: Works great!

author: Mok Keith
comment: Keep crashing, cannot open
title: Keep crashing

author: Mary Reeves
comment: Qfc 😶                                                                 one thousand nine hundred eighty one 😶
title: 😶 one thousand nine hundred eighty 😶 qfc

author: Gregory Asher
comment: To developer; take a look at the Safeway ui, it's way more functional and easier to use.
title: Needs ui update.

author: Brian Jones
comment: It makes my shopping experience superb!!!

author: Sara Leekley
comment: Love being able to add e-coupons at any time, even right before I head to the checkout line.
title: App works great

author: Roï Eisenkot
comment: But why can't we just pull the side drawer from anywhere at the left of the screen like every other app??
title: Nicely designed.

author: Stacey Davis
comment: My favorite store
title: Qfc

author: Miranda Lowe
comment: I'd be lost without my qfc app, easiest way to shop

author: Eric Hanchrow
comment: Pointless

author: Bruce Leban
comment: This app makes shopping a painfully tedious and frustrating experience. Give me one button that says "give me the best prices" period. Browsing to find sales is fine but forcing me to click on each one or get overcharged is enough to make me shop elsewhere. With paper coupons I can take the bundle without all that work.
title: Digital coupon system is awful, a terrible idea

author: sagal abdi
comment: Hi
title: Waberi17

author: Desiree Martinez
comment: Sweet
title: Awesome

author: James press
comment: Safeway usually has better savings but free Friday from Kroger is awesome. Good app.
title: Alright

author: Jeff Lewis
comment: I have high hopes that this ap will work someday as QFC is the only place that I shop. It closes as soon as I try to open it.
title: Can't get this to open.

author: A Google User
comment: I'm not going to blindly update your apps because you tell me to. You need to state what you're changing and why as well as explain your use of permissions before I trust you. Show me and other users some respect! One star due to what I can only  perceive as arrogance.
title: No list of changes? NO SALE!

author: Mike Houle
comment: The app won't let you install it on SD card (to save system memory for other things).  Welcome to the functionality of an app from 2005... Catch up, please.  That's just basic stuff.
title: Installation failure...

author: Rev M
comment: Downloaded the app from the laptop. It never came through. I went to the service desk at QFC Seattle, Northgate, and they said it should be there. But it isn't, so don't know how it works.

author: Lindsey Foster
comment: I shop here almost everyday. All the employees are really nice and they put our needs and wants first.

author: Kristie D. Scharer
comment: Love my QFC. Order more lamb next Easter. My specialty!

author: Floria Myers Myers
comment: A ok
title: Info

author: M L
comment: uninformative validation

author: Karen Hagopian
comment: Thanks for the app

author: Joe Uranga
comment: Junk
